statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, resolution, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images;
SELECT sensor_type, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type = 'LIDAR';
SELECT image_id, resolution, sensor_type FROM satellite_images ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT image_id, resolution, sensor_type FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id < 100 ORDER BY resolution ASC
SELECT image_id, acquisition_date, sensor_type FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution = 'High' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT image_id, resolution, acquisition_date, sensor_type FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%1' OR sensor_type LIKE '%2' ORDER BY image_id ASC
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, resolution, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, sensor_type FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT image_id, tag_name FROM satellite_images JOIN image_tags ON satellite_images.image_id = image_tags.image_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution > 1.0 ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT image_id, sensor_type FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT image_id, resolution, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type = 'Landsat' ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC
SELECT * FROM satellite_images INNER JOIN image_tags ON satellite_images.image_id = image_tags.image_id WHERE tag_name = 'mountain'
SELECT image_id, resolution, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution < 0.5 OR sensor_type = 'Sentinel' ORDER BY resolution ASC, acquisition_date DESC
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution = 'high';
SELECT image_id, sensor_type FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT image_id, property_name, property_value FROM image_properties WHERE property_name = 'cloud_coverage';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE resolution_supported LIKE '%medium%';
SELECT sensor_type, resolution_supported FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution = 'High'
SELECT image_id, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT satellite_images.image_id, sensor_type, resolution_supported FROM satellite_images INNER JOIN sensors ON satellite_images.sensor_type = sensors.sensor_type

SELECT satellite_images.image_id, image_properties.property_name, image_properties.property_value FROM satellite_images LEFT JOIN image_properties ON satellite_images.image_id = image_properties.image_id
SELECT MAX(acquisition_date) AS latest_date, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM satellite_images
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, resolution, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images;
SELECT * FROM image_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'location';
SELECT image_id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM image_metadata;
SELECT sensor_name FROM sensor_types;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution > 2.5;
SELECT image_id, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type = 'Lidar' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM image_metadata WHERE metadata_key LIKE '%location%';
SELECT * FROM image_metadata JOIN satellite_images ON image_metadata.image_id = satellite_images.image_id WHERE satellite_images.resolution <= 3.0;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM sensor_types GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING total_sensors >= 2 ORDER BY total_sensors DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_resolution, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE image_resolution > 100;
SELECT image_format, image_path FROM image_metadata ORDER BY image_format ASC;
SELECT sensor_model, manufacturer, launch_date FROM satellite_sensors WHERE manufacturer='NASA';
SELECT image_id, acquisition_time, location FROM acquisition_logs WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_resolution > 100 ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM image_metadata WHERE image_format = 'jpeg' AND image_path LIKE '%/images/%';
SELECT sensor_model, manufacturer, launch_date FROM satellite_sensors WHERE manufacturer IN ('NASA', 'SpaceX') ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(max_intensity) AS max_intensity, MIN(min_intensity) AS min_intensity FROM image_stats;
SELECT image_id, acquisition_time, location FROM acquisition_logs ORDER BY acquisition_time DESC LIMIT 10;
